abstract: Johnson & Johnson has submitted concessions to the European Union in an effort to complete its $21.3 billion takeover of the Swiss-American medical tools maker Synthes.
snippet: Johnson & Johnson has submitted concessions to the European Union in an effort to complete its $21.3 billion takeover of the Swiss-American medical tools maker Synthes.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Johnson & Johnson has submitted concessions to the European Union in an effort to complete its $21.3 billion takeover of the Swiss-American medical tools maker Synthes.

headline.main: J.&J. Offers Concessions to Win Approval for Synthes Deal
